GSD.description: Canon imagePROGRAF and imageRUNNER devices through 2022-03-14 generate RSA keys that can be broken with Fermat's factorization method. This allows efficient calculation of private RSA keys from the public key of a TLS certificate.

osvSchema.details: ** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: CVE-2022-26320. Reason: This candidate is a reservation duplicate of CVE-2022-26320. Notes: All CVE users should reference CVE-2022-26320 instead of this candidate. All references and descriptions in this candidate have been removed to prevent accidental usage.

description_data.value: ** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: CVE-2022-26320. Reason: This candidate is a reservation duplicate of CVE-2022-26320. Notes: All CVE users should reference CVE-2022-26320 instead of this candidate. All references and descriptions in this candidate have been removed to prevent accidental usage.

Canon imagePROGRAF and imageRUNNER devices through 2022-03-14 generate RSA keys that can be broken with Fermat's factorization method. This allows efficient calculation of private RSA keys from the public key of a TLS certificate.
